headline.print_headline: $8M for 88 Victims of Abuse by Franciscan Friar
headline.main: $8M for 88 Victims of Abuse by Franciscan Friar

lead_paragraph: Eighty-eight former students who were sexually molested by a Franciscan friar who worked as an athletic trainer at a Catholic high school have settled their legal claims for $8 million, according to two attorneys who represent more than half the victims.
